description: A specialised fluid sac has been installed in the roof of the user's mouth, which is capable of storing various sprayable chemicals. When activated a volatile glob of fluid will be launched from the user's mouth, nearly instantly dispersing into a targeted cone of gas.

Large storage and venting systems have been installed within the user's torso, capable of dispersing large amounts of gas into the surrounding atmosphere continuously. A small label is placed on one of the outer vents reading: 'WARNING: System activation floods the surrounding area, including the user, with stored chemicals. USE WITH CAUTION'
